events.message: I recently received the laptop I ordered, but it has a deep scratch on the screen and the keyboard keys are sticking. I need help with this issue.
The case was categorized as a product defect based on the customer's description of scratches and malfunctioning keyboard.
Your case has been assigned to a technical support agent who will assist you further with the damaged product.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the issues with your laptop. I’m here to help you resolve this as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the scratched screen and the keys that are sticking, as well as the order number for verification?
I have attached pictures of the damaged screen and the keyboard area, and my order number is 123456789. Please advise what can be done.
Thank you for the details. We can arrange a replacement unit to be shipped to you immediately, and we will provide a prepaid label for returning the defective laptop.
I appreciate the quick response and the offer for a replacement. Please proceed with the shipment as soon as possible.
The replacement device has been dispatched today, and the prepaid return label has been sent to your email. Thank you for your patience.
We are checking in to confirm that the replacement laptop was received and is functioning well. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Since there have been no further issues reported, we are closing your case. Thank you for contacting support and we hope you enjoy your new laptop.
